Text:
If you encounter problems:
I use MPC (Media Player Classic - Home Cinema), or VLC to watch this incredible piece of video.
Both programs MPC and VLC are freeware. 

Just google if u ain't have it, or change the suffix of the filename to .mpg and that will do the trick too.

Enjoy!

Tks for the UP OP

This is not the entire Concert, Its 5:21min of Bruce's guest appearence with the Stones!

Will you upload the full concert?

Cheers.
That would be great in 1080i if you had the entire concert
